beginTransaction

public RDFBeanTransaction beginTransaction()
Description copied from interface: Session
Begins a new read-write transaction with a default timeout. All session usage is within transaction scope.

Returns:
the transaction

beginTransaction

public RDFBeanTransaction beginTransaction(boolean readOnly,
                                           int txTimeout,
                                           int isolationLevel)
Description copied from interface: Session
Begins a new transaction. All session usage is within transaction scope.

Parameters:
readOnly - true if this should be a read-only transaction, false if a read-write transaction
txTimeout - the transaction timeout, in seconds; if <= 0 then use the default timeout
isolationLevel - the isolation level of the transaction
Returns:
the transaction
